titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of the third Thursday in November as "National Pressure Ulcer/Injury Prevention Day" and promoting enhanced care coordination and prevention resources to reduce the development of pressure ulcers/injuries.

Expressing support for the designation of the third Thursday in November as "National Pressure Ulcer/Injury Prevention Day" and promoting enhanced care coordination and prevention resources to reduce the development of pressure ulcers/injuries.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: Expresses support for the designation of National Pressure Ulcer/Injury Prevention Day.
